game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost city.
game.description: Legend has it that a powerful artifact lies hidden within the lost city, and only those who dare to venture in can claim its power. Brave adventurer, will you answer the call?
game.reward: 500 gold, +10 strength, and a magical amulet

task.objective: Speak with Gorvoth to gather information about the lost city.
task.description: Gather any useful intel from Gorvoth before setting out on your quest.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the lost city.
task.description: Be cautious of treacherous terrain and hostile creatures as you make your way through the dense jungle.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from within the lost city.
task.description: Beware of deadly traps and guardians as you search for the artifact.
